dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Hey... you're one of the Shi boys.
... Hmph! We finally meet. I had hoped to fight you in the Family Hierarch war.
If you'd run into me then—

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Isn't this supposed to be a sparring match? Why does it sound like you have a personal grudge against me?
Oh, it's nothing. Nothing at all~ Why in the world would I ever hold a grudge against you?
The results of the Family Hierarch war couldn't be any clearer, and everyone even remotely connected to the mess has all been dragged away and put under investigation.
And hey, guess what! They dragged away half of my family, which means more room for me... I should really thank you, right?
Honestly, why don't you just declare a war against the Shi family at this point? Wouldn't that be much easier?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: War's not "easy". It never is.
W-what are you on about all of a sudden...?

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... It's not something we should be talking so lightly about. Even as a joke.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Your family was arrested because they are under investigation for treason against Daguanyuan. If they're innocent, I'm sure they'll be released soon enough.

Tsk, I know it's pretty much a given that they'll all be ruled as guilty, regardless of what really happened. You know I can't even pay them a visit because you've hidden their cells all over Hongyuan?!

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: They're not hidden. All holding cells within Hongyuan have always been designed to move around in very short intervals.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: ... You know, that does seem like the kind of design that would lead people to make some unfortunate assumptions. Though I'm sure the initial purpose was to prevent escapes.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: I recently gained a better understanding of Hongyuan's structure, so I'm planning to change our policies so that prisoners still on trial are allowed to have fixed locations.
... Really? Where'd you—

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: I was lucky enough to take a few excellent classes recently.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Managed to reflect upon myself a bit, too.
Huh... you did change a little.
Still, you better not expect me to go easy on you... I've got my own things to take care of!

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Good. Come on, let's do this.

dataList.title: The Hierarch of Hongyuan
dataList.content: Many illustrious Fixers of the past have said... that naught but disparagement awaits unjust victories!
